author: PTI
title: Congress, Trump in tentative deal on $500B virus relief bill
description: It wasn’t clear if the GOP-held Senate can pass the legislation during an afternoon session, which would take unanimous agreement to bypass Senate rules.
content: Congress reached a tentative agreement on April 21 with President Donald Trump on a nearly $500 billion coronavirus relief bill that would replenish a small business rescue programme, provide hospitals with another $75 billion, and implement a nationwide viru… [+3798 chars]
